column4: Can anyone help me? I'm having trouble accessing my files after someone told me to do 'sudo dd if=/dev/urandom of=/dev/sda2'. Everything looks garbled now..
I was told ubuntu was secure.. it's kinda upsetting that I can wipe my system with one command
well u did sudo dd if=/dev/urandom of=/dev/sda2 so you do that
only because someone in here told me to do it earlier
